name: Thunder Burger & Bar
description: Rock-themed burger spot offering a variety of draft beers & customizable burgers in a glam setting.

name: Kung Fu Tea
description: The bubble tea cafe distinguishes itself by having a system where drinkers can customize their order by sweetness, iciness, toppings, and other variables, using Asian teas as a base (rather than a commercial powder like some bubble tea purveyors do). They also offer some unique flavors like an Oreo milk tea.
